dialogues.speaker: Marong
dialogues.text: Hello, I've never seen you around before. How are you doing today?

dialogues.speaker: Yongyong
dialogues.text: Ah, hi! I'm doing great, thanks for asking. Just excited for some fun.

dialogues.speaker: Marong
dialogues.text: That sounds wonderful! So, what role do you think you'll play in our group activities today?

dialogues.speaker: Yongyong
dialogues.text: Honestly, it doesn't matter to me. I'm just here to have a good time.

dialogues.speaker: Marong
dialogues.text: I see. Well, I was thinking about the book we're supposed to read for our group activities today. Have you read it?

dialogues.speaker: Yongyong
dialogues.text: Nah, I didn't bother. I'm not really into reading, to be honest.

dialogues.speaker: Marong
dialogues.text: Okay, no problem. Did you happen to bring a copy of the book with you, just in case?

dialogues.speaker: Yongyong
dialogues.text: Ha! Nope, I didn't even think about it. It's way more fun to play around than sit down and read a book.

dialogues.speaker: Marong
dialogues.text: I understand what you mean, but our teacher did give us homework to do together. Just thought I'd mention it.

dialogues.speaker: Yongyong
dialogues.text: Oh, yeah, yeah. Like I said, I'm not really concerned about it. There are plenty of other people who can help me with that stuff. Can we just focus on having fun instead?

dialogues.speaker: Marong
dialogues.text: Well... I guess that's your decision.
